title: Font Sans Serif
content:
Hello  
Can anyone help me to give me the name of this font?

It is a bit difficult, but I think someone may recognize the "S" immediately

[https://timgeorgedesign.files.wordpress.com/2009/11/dsc\_0269-small.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317110829/https:/timgeorgedesign.files.wordpress.com/2009/11/dsc_0269-small.jpg "https://timgeorgedesign.files.wordpress.com/2009/11/dsc\_0269-small.jpg")
author: plax
